scripts.db:generate: docker compose exec apps npm run db:generate --workspace=apps/backend
scripts.db:migrate: docker compose exec apps with-env npm run db:migrate --workspace=apps/backend
scripts.db:seed: docker compose exec apps npm run db:seed --workspace=apps/backend
scripts.db:studio: docker compose exec apps npm run db:studio --workspace=apps/backend
scripts.quality:frontend: docker compose exec apps npm run quality --workspace=apps/frontend
scripts.quality:backend: docker compose exec apps npm run quality --workspace=apps/backend
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json apps/*/node_modules apps/*/dist apps/*/.nuxt apps/*/.output
